name: Pogcast Championship - Giant Rom 2017
description:
I took the theme of East Vs West and extrapolated that to a podcast vs podcast competition. The idea began as a cross between Hearthstone and the game of Pogs (based on Dans love for the sport), with differently powered slammers and unlockable decks - sadly to say those goals were not achieved but the basics are there.

Its janky and began to frequently crash within the last hour, but it exists and took way too many hours to make, so I'm uploading it anyway. Have fun.

Also I forgot to put in the ingame menu so once that game starts you'll have to alt-f4 to quit.

Peace out.
